pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'ggplot2' Functions to Create Tufte Style Sparklines // Functions to help with creating sparklines in the style of Edward Tufte https://www.edwardtufte.com/bboard/q-and-a-fetch- msg?msg_id=0001ORtopic_id=1 in 'ggplot2'. It computes ribbon geoms with the interquartile ranges and points and/or labels at the beginning, end, max, and min points.
